item.description:
January 21, 2010- Monthly Meeting
Zack Childress

How to make money right now with Virtual Investing in Today's Market using Power Automation to Sky Rocket your income

Zack Childress, “Mr. Automation” will discuss automated tools and techniques that all investors can benefit and grow their business with.

You'll learn:

7 Secrets to having a successful business in any market and in any market cycle
The Power of outsourcing your business and doing it for pennies on the dollar
How to automate your business and how to start working on your business and not in it
How to use technology to find motivated sellers and buyers on the internet with no work on your end
Zack will show you one tool that will pull all the REO properties at any discount you want right from the Banks Vault. This will make you a fortune.

With no major education nor experience, Zack Childress went on to create systems through automation that allowed him to generate five figures a month in positive cash flow. Where most people would retire he didn’t, he still buys and sells real estate today in this market using those same systems. He is one of the leading experts on Automating your Real Estate Business and Virtual investing. He invests in 6 different markets across the U.S. using his virtual investing strategies.

He coaches students all over the United States for over four years, including some of the biggest name real estate investors in the market.

Zack Childress has a widely diverse business background. He is a highly successful Real Estate Investor & Business Developer. Zack has an Investment company which has been successfully operating for over 6 years, a funding company for over 3 years, and a wholesaling business for over 6 years. He is always finding new ways to automate his business to maximize his returns.

Zack spent the last 6 years of his full-time investing career creating automated virtual investing systems that would give him and his wife back their time. Now their real estate investing companies can run on their own. And they now have the freedom to do whatever they want, whenever they want. He took all the education he learned over the past 14 years and brought it into the 21st century by fully automating his businesses.

Zack made investing in Real Estate so easy that now anyone can invest from anywhere they have a computer and phone. He knew he had to be focused on marketing and getting as many leads as possible coming through his systems. Therefore, he could keep the deals he wants to buy and wholesale the rest to other investors. So, Zack’s main investing technique is wholesaling for quick cash so he can take that cash and invest in Commercial Real Estate.

Monthly Meeting
5:30 - 6:15 PM - Power Hour - Networking

6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Best Western Hotel, 380 Winter St, Waltham, Ma

Free to members, Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: 1/21 Boston AREIA meeting - "Mr. Automation"
